briefTitle: Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of ABT-335 in Combination With Simvastatin in Subjects With Multiple Abnormal Lipid Levels in the Blood

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subjects with mixed dyslipidemia
* Subjects agree to utilize adequate birth control methods and to adhere to the American Heart Association (AHA) diet.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subjects with unstable medical conditions or medical conditions considered inappropriate in a clinical trial.
* Patients who are taking certain medications or unstable dose of specific medications.
* Women who are pregnant or plan on becoming pregnant, or women who are lactating.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Triglycerides From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 triglycerides minus baseline triglycerides)/baseline triglycerides\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in High-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (HDL-C) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 HDL-C minus baseline HDL-C)/baseline HDL-C\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Low-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 LDL-C minus baseline LDL-C)/baseline LDL-C\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Non-high-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (Non-HDL-C) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 non-HDL-C minus baseline non-HDL-C)/baseline non-HDL-C\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Very Low-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (VLDL-C)From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 VLDL-C minus baseline VLDL-C)/baseline VLDL-C\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Total Cholesterol From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 total cholesterol minus baseline total cholesterol)/baseline total cholesterol\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Lipoprotein Apo B (Apo B) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 Apo B minus baseline Apo B)/baseline Apo B\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Median Percent Change in High-sensitivity C-reactive Protein (hsCRP) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 hsCRP minus baseline hsCRP)/baseline hsCRP\] x 100
